title: Judd Family Adventures in Reno
name: Judd Family Adventures in Reno
description:
A Map by Jamiejudd

Judd Family in Reno Nevada.  Where we lived, what we did, significant events and places in our lives...

properties.name: ATC riding
properties.description: Posted by Jamiejudd The Honda Big Red 200, the vehicle for adventures in the mountians behind the house. We rode up and down the mountains. We explored and discovered incredible places with waterfalls, views above the fog, lakes, indian artifacts and more!!

properties.name: Dad's rabbit graveyard
properties.description: Posted by JamiejuddOnce Dad would catch the little suckers in his garden or eating the grass, he would blow them away with the .22 and bury them here in the rabbit graveyard. Either by bullet or large rock heaved into the air -- these rabbits didn\'t stand a chance!

properties.name: Hunter Creek Canyon
properties.description: Posted by Jamiejudd The ultimate hiking destination from our house, and into the mountains...many great camping/hiking trips there. Taking the .22 rifle and the bear compound bow, we hiked the trail; stumbled upon and shot up rattlesnakes and enjoyed an evening of shooting target practice, eating steaks cooked over the fire and realizing this was ours.

properties.name: Matt's Broken Arm
properties.description: Posted by JamiejuddWe had the Lyon\'s up for a fun weekend of mountain play, and Matt was anxious to ride the ATC. Up Plateau road they went...to a so called...flat section... Matt used the thumb throttle to find the only rock available and flip the ATC and break his arm.

properties.name: Our House
properties.description: Posted by Jamiejudd 4195 christy lane, reno, nevadaThe Judd Family House in Reno

properties.name: Race course & Shooting practice
properties.description: Posted by JamiejuddThere didn\'t used to be a road here...with the freedom of the open desert mountains, we used this area and build a cool hill ATC race course, with berms and a place to shoot target practice once we got bored riding...

properties.name: Roy Gomm Elementary School
properties.description: Posted by Jamiejudd Jeremy went to elementary school here! Remember the days on the playground, the cold mornings...driving 15 mph around the school (its like were were in the movie "Clockstoppers" as soon as we passed the flashing sign! Oh yeah, soccer games!

properties.name: Seasonal Waterfalls
properties.description: Posted by JamiejuddRiding the ATC on the two roads that traversed the mountain side behind our house (remember when there were no houses anywhere within sight out our back window?), and discovered two waterfalls that ran in the springtime. Beautiful vertical drops that could be heard at the house on a quiet spring morning.

properties.name: Steamboat Canal
properties.description: Posted by JamiejuddMany long summer days spent floating down here. Just six feet wide and 2 - 3 feet deep in places; it was like a mini-amazon river in other places. We\'d walk up the road next to the canal and float down to home and get out. Once a huge rattlesnake wrapped itself around a sagebrush plant hanging over the canal as we passed by quietly...
